verses.verse: <S%G2455>Jude,<s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James,<s%> to them that are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> by <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> and <S%G5083>preserved<s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G2822>called:<s%>
<S%G1656>Mercy<s%> to you, and <S%G1515>peace,<s%> and <S%G26>love,<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied.<s%>

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> when I <S%G4160>gave<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> to you of the <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> it was <S%G318>needful<s%> for me to <S%G1125>write<s%> to you, and <S%G3870>exhort<s%> you that you should <S%G1864>earnestly<s%> <S%G1864>contend<s%> for the <S%G4102>faith<s%> which was <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to the <S%G40>saints.<s%>

For there are <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G3921>crept<s%> in <S%G3921>unawares,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> were <S%G4270>before<s%> of <S%G3819>old<s%> <S%G4270>ordained<s%> to <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation,<s%> <S%G765>ungodly<s%> men, <S%G3346>turning<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness,<s%> and <S%G720>denying<s%> the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1203>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> and our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

I <S%G1014>will<s%> therefore <S%G5279>put<s%> you in <S%G5179>remembrance,<s%> though you <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> how that the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> having <S%G4982>saved<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> out of the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G1208>afterward<s%> <S%G622>destroyed<s%> them that <S%G4100>believed<s%> not.

And the <S%G32>angels<s%> which <S%G5083>kept<s%> not their <S%G746>first<s%> estate, but <S%G620>left<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3613>habitation,<s%> he has <S%G5083>reserved<s%> in <S%G126>everlasting<s%> <S%G1199>chains<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G2217>darkness<s%> to the <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

<S%G5613>Even<s%> as <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> and <S%G1116>Gomorrha,<s%> and the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> them in <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G5158>manner,<s%> <S%G3923>giving<s%> themselves <S%G1608>over<s%> to <S%G1608>fornication,<s%> and <S%G565>going<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G2087>strange<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> are <S%G4295>set<s%> <S%G4295>forth<s%> for an <S%G1164>example,<s%> <S%G5254>suffering<s%> the <S%G1349>vengeance<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

<S%G3668>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> filthy <S%G1797>dreamers<s%> <S%G3392>defile<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G114>despise<s%> <S%G2963>dominion,<s%> and <S%G987>speak<s%> <S%G987>evil<s%> of <S%G1391>dignities.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> <S%G3413>Michael<s%> the <S%G743>archangel,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G1252>contending<s%> with the <S%G1228>devil<s%> he <S%G1256>disputed<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G5111>dared<s%> not <S%G2018>bring<s%> <S%G2018>against<s%> him a <S%G988>railing<s%> <S%G2920>accusation,<s%> but <S%G2036>said,<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> you.

But <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G987>speak<s%> <S%G987>evil<s%> of <S%G3745>those<s%> things <S%G3745>which<s%> they <S%G1492>know<s%> not: but <S%G3745>what<s%> they <S%G1987>know<s%> <S%G5447>naturally,<s%> as <S%G249>brute<s%> <S%G2226>beasts,<s%> in <S%G5125>those<s%> things they <S%G5351>corrupt<s%> themselves.

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to them! for they have <S%G4198>gone<s%> in the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2535>Cain,<s%> and <S%G1632>ran<s%> <S%G1632>greedily<s%> after the <S%G4106>error<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam<s%> for <S%G3408>reward,<s%> and <S%G622>perished<s%> in the <S%G485>gainsaying<s%> of <S%G2879>Core.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> are <S%G4694>spots<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> feasts of <S%G26>charity,<s%> when they <S%G4910>feast<s%> with you, <S%G4165>feeding<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G870>without<s%> <S%G870>fear:<s%> <S%G3507>clouds<s%> they are <S%G504>without<s%> <S%G504>water,<s%> <S%G4064>carried<s%> <S%G4064>about<s%> of <S%G417>winds;<s%> <S%G1186>trees<s%> whose <S%G5352>fruit<s%> <S%G5352>wither,<s%> <S%G175>without<s%> <S%G175>fruit,<s%> <S%G1364>twice<s%> <S%G599>dead,<s%> <S%G1610>plucked<s%> up by the <S%G1610>roots;<s%>

<S%G66>Raging<s%> <S%G2949>waves<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G1890>foaming<s%> out their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G152>shame;<s%> <S%G4107>wandering<s%> <S%G792>stars,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G5083>reserved<s%> the <S%G2217>blackness<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> for <S%G165>ever.<s%>

And <S%G1802>Enoch<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> from <S%G76>Adam,<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> of <S%G5125>these,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> with <S%G3461>ten<s%> <S%G3461>thousands<s%> of his <S%G40>saints,<s%>

To <S%G4160>execute<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> on <S%G3956>all,<s%> and to <S%G1827>convince<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that are <S%G763>ungodly<s%> among them of <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G763>ungodly<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G764>ungodly<s%> <S%G764>committed,<s%> and of <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G4642>hard<s%> speeches <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> him.

<S%G3778>These<s%> are <S%G1113>murmurers,<s%> <S%G3202>complainers,<s%> <S%G4198>walking<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G1939>lusts;<s%> and their <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2980>speaks<s%> <S%G5246>great<s%> <S%G5246>swelling<s%> words, having <S%G4383>men's<s%> <S%G4383>persons<s%> in <S%G2296>admiration<s%> <S%G5484>because<s%> of <S%G5622>advantage.<s%>

But, <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G3415>remember<s%> you the <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were <S%G4280>spoken<s%> <S%G4280>before<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

How that they <S%G3004>told<s%> you there should be <S%G1703>mockers<s%> in the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5550>time,<s%> who should <S%G4198>walk<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G763>ungodly<s%> <S%G1939>lusts.<s%>
<S%G3778>These<s%> be they who <S%G592>separate<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G5591>sensual,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> not the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

But you, <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G2026>building<s%> up <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> on <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G40>most<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> in the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%>

<S%G5083>Keep<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> in the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G4327>looking<s%> for the <S%G1656>mercy<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
And of <S%G3588>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> have <S%G1653>compassion,<s%> <S%G1252>making<s%> a <S%G1252>difference:<s%>

And <S%G3739>others<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> with <S%G5401>fear,<s%> <S%G726>pulling<s%> them out of the <S%G4442>fire;<s%> <S%G3404>hating<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G5509>garment<s%> <S%G4695>spotted<s%> by the <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to him that is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5442>keep<s%> you from <S%G679>falling,<s%> and to <S%G2476>present<s%> you <S%G299>faultless<s%> <S%G2714>before<s%> the <S%G2714>presence<s%> of his <S%G1391>glory<s%> with exceeding <S%G20>joy,<s%>

To the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> our <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G3172>majesty,<s%> <S%G2904>dominion<s%> and <S%G1849>power,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> and <S%G3956>ever.<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
